The horizontal axis represents the variable h and has the label Hours. It ranges from 0 to 24 in increments of 6. The vertical axis is labeled Temperature with values in degrees Fahrenheit. It ranges from 0 to 70 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at (0 comma 35).

The curve increases to reach a high point at (12 comma 65) before decreasing back to (24 comma 35).

The curve appears to be symmetric about the vertical line h = 12.

​During a month in a certain town, the temperature increases and decreases over the course of a day. A graph of the average temperatures during that month for any given day is shown. The data in the graph can be modeled by the function <math alttext="T"><mi>T</mi></math>, where <math alttext="T open parentheses h close parentheses"><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced></math> gives the temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit (<math alttext="degrees F"><semantics><mrow><mo>°</mo><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), at time <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> hours after midnight. At a certain point in that month, there is an adjustment to clocks for daylight saving time, at which point clocks are adjusted <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> hour forward. For example, <math alttext="6"><mn>6</mn></math> a.m. instantly becomes <math alttext="7"><mn>7</mn></math> a.m. The function <math alttext="D"><mi>D</mi></math> models the same data as function <math alttext="T"><mi>T</mi></math>, after the shift to daylight saving time. If <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> still represents the number of hours after midnight, which of the following defines <math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced></math> in terms of <math alttext="T"><mi>T</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses equals T open parentheses h plus 1 close parentheses"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses equals T open parentheses h minus 1 close parentheses"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses equals T open parentheses h close parentheses plus 1"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

​<math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses equals T open parentheses h close parentheses minus 1"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="D open parentheses h close parentheses equals T open parentheses h minus 1 close parentheses"><mi>D</mi><mfenced><mi>h</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
